title: 49: Fast Focus & Flow (Q&A with Steven Kotler)
description: In this episode Steven Kotler and I go in depth on focus and flow. Both focus and flow are common traits among top performers and we're going to break down some of the best ways to improve these for yourself.
content:encoded: In this episode Steven Kotler and I go in depth on focus and flow. Both focus and flow are common traits among top performers and we're going to break down some of the best ways to improve these for yourself.
